title: Makes state standards for energy efficient appliances, products and building design applicable to N.Y. city
summary: Makes state standards for the state and its agencies for energy efficient appliances, energy-using products and new or substantially renovated building design and specifications applicable to a city of one million or more.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the energy law, in relation to making standards for energy efficient appliances applicable to any city with a population of one million or more
